https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xQ6rigrIRCMGrNNx00mhosuampX.jpg The film is a small, very individual story about seeing. In 5 minutes, an animation of pencil drawings shows how a figure follows one's own vision ... playing with it, succumbing to it, transforming it, feeling it, experiencing ... accompanied by a voice and its multiple Augenblick
